short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Voice typing. Dictate into any website. Real-time voice transcription.

long.am,ar,bn,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es_419,fa,:
Echo - Speech-to-Text is a state-of-the-art voice typing tool that works on most websites. Experience the most accurate speech recognition accuracy available.

Key Features:

- ✨ Automatic Punctuation: Enjoy automatic punctuation for polished, professional text.

- 🗣️ Voice Type Directly into Textbox: No weird overlay or copy-pasting.

- 🌍 Multi-language Support: Supports 50+ languages, including English, Spanish, German, French, etc. Instantly switch between languages.

- 🛠️ Custom Vocabularies: Add specialized vocabulary or uncommon nouns to boost transcription accuracy.

- ⌨️ Keyboard Shortcut: Start and pause voice recognition quickly with a simple keyboard shortcut.

🔒 Trusted and Secure
Your privacy is our priority – we do not collect or share your data. We do NOT store any dictation text in our database.

🛡️ HIPAA Compliance
We are HIPAA compliant in practice. Audio recordings are never stored. Transcription texts are stored for less than 24 hours and can be deleted immediately upon request.  In certain situations, we can also sign a BAA. If that is required, please reach out to discuss this further with our team.

🎁 Generous Free-tier
Access all essential features at no cost. Dictate for 2 hours per month for free on popular websites.

Save time and boost productivity by dictating text anywhere on the web. Try our game-changing extension now and revolutionize the way you type!

📞 Contact Us
Questions or feedback? Reach out to us at matt@echo-stt.com.
long.bg,ca,cs,da,de,el,es,et,fi,fr,hi,hu,id,i:
Transform your typing with Echo, our state-of-the-art voice typing tool. Simply speak and your voice is transcribed into the selected input.

Key Features:

- 🗣️ Speak Directly into Text Boxes: Dictate text on any webpage, including emails, forms, and chats.

- ✨ Automatic Punctuation: Enjoy automatic punctuation for polished, professional text.

- 🎯 Cutting-Edge Accuracy: Experience the highest level of speech recognition accuracy available, ensuring your words are captured perfectly.

- ⌨️ Keyboard Shortcut: Start and pause voice recognition quickly with a simple keyboard shortcut.

🔒 Trusted and Secure
Your privacy is our priority – we do not collect or share your data.
- We do NOT store any dictation text in our database.

🛡️ HIPAA Compliance
We are HIPAA compliant in practice. Audio recordings are never stored. Transcription texts are stored for less than 24 hours and can be deleted immediately upon request.  In certain situations, we can also sign a BAA. If that is required, please reach out to discuss this further with our team.

🎁 Generous Free-tier
Access all essential features at no cost. Dictate for 30 minutes per day for free on popular websites.
